directions: Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Add veal, garlic and rosemary; sauté until veal is no longer pink, breaking up large clumps with back of spoon, about 5 minutes. Add mushrooms; sauté 5 minutes. Add tomatoes, wine, broth and tomato paste. Bring to boil. Reduce heat to medium; simmer until mixture thickens to sauce consistency, stirring occasionally, about 30 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon chopped fresh rosemary or 2 teaspoons dried
title: Veal, Mushroom and Red Wine Sauce
